scripts.reset: npm run docker:clean && npm run install:all
scripts.docker:reset: echo '⚠️ ATTENZIONE: docker:reset cancella tutti i dati! Usa docker:reset-safe per backup automatico o docker:restart per riavvio sicuro' && exit 1
scripts.docker:reset-safe: npm run docker:backup && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && npm run dev
scripts.docker:psql: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres-dev psql -U pilotpros_user -d pilotpros_db
scripts.docker:backup: docker run --rm -v pilotpros_postgres_dev_data:/data -v $(pwd):/backup ubuntu tar czf /backup/postgres-volume-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).tar.gz /data && docker run --rm -v pilotpros_n8n_dev_data:/data -v $(pwd):/backup ubuntu tar czf /backup/n8n-volume-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).tar.gz /data
scripts.docker:backup-safe: npm run docker:backup && echo '✅ Backup completato - ora puoi eseguire operazioni distruttive'
scripts.n8n:auto-setup: echo '⚠️ Use Docker containers only - no host Node.js'
scripts.import:backup: echo '⚠️ Use Docker exec for database operations'
scripts.export:backup: echo '⚠️ Use Docker exec for database operations'
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:ai-agent
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:ai-agent" "npm run start:n8n"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../ai-agent && npm install
scripts.build:image: echo '⚠️ Use Docker build commands only'
scripts.test:docker: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend-dev npm test
scripts.test:backend: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend-dev npm test
scripts.test:frontend: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec frontend-dev npm test
scripts.test:integration: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend-dev npm run test:integration
scripts.team:sync:
npm run team:export && echo '
🔄 Ora chiedi al collega di eseguire: npm run team:import'
